comments: Professor Studebaker\'s class was NOT an easy A. I had to study and work very hard. Do not expect this class to be a light workload. However, Professor Studebaker is nice and helpful. She is great with answering e-mails. Even though this class was difficult I learned so much! Just study, do all the assignments and don\'t slack off! Recommended!

Extremely understnading and helpful. She is not easy by any means but if you\'re willing to put in the effort and work ( A lot) you will get a good grade and she will make sure you are not just forgotten. Very understanding and willimg to work with you.
If you are going to take an on line spanish class....she is the one to sign up with!!

Took Spa 101 on-line in the spring of \'11. Class was hard & required a LOT of studying, but it was fair. It\'s a hard course no matter who teaches it. She was very prompt in answering all of my e-mails. She always responded within 24 hours. She was extremely helpful & very understanding. I would definitely recommend her to anyone. My last Spa teache
made me hate spanish..how do u move on when the class is clearly bombibg..she has to hate her job

CRAZY! assigns the whole chapter and every lesson in it as if shes the only class your taking!
